name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】バーチャルアイドルが踊ってみた！ #かなたんしか勝たん【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [_pC9JaHyyjQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs the song 'Yoi Yoi Kokon' in a 3D live setting with a traditional Japanese festival-themed background.
Amane Kanata speaks to the audience during an MC segment, reflecting on the performance and introducing the next song.
Amane Kanata and Houshou Marine perform a duet of 'Kami-ppoi na'.

subtitles.original: 此の世人の世は恨めしい
subtitles.english: This world of mortals is resentful

subtitles.original: 雪駄はちゃっちゃっちゃ 愛し
subtitles.english: Snow sandals go click-clack-click, my love

subtitles.original: 縋って梛んで満身創痍で それ それ それ それ
subtitles.english: Clinging, bowing, battered all over, sore, sore, sore, sore

subtitles.original: 今を嘆いて昔を懐かしても
subtitles.english: Lamenting the present, longing for the past

subtitles.original: 君の心の内 流る深河
subtitles.english: Within your heart, a deep river flows

subtitles.original: それじゃ敵わん 何処にいても
subtitles.english: That won't do, no matter where you are

subtitles.original: めくるめく舞台に君を連れて
subtitles.english: Taking you to a dazzling stage

subtitles.original: あまりてなどか人で悲しき
subtitles.english: Too much, why is it so sad for a human?

subtitles.original: 身勝手なのが世の理か
subtitles.english: Is being selfish the way of the world?

subtitles.original: 万人持つ理想 虚像の偶像
subtitles.english: Ideals held by everyone, hollow idols

subtitles.original: 俗な答えなどはあつらえむ
subtitles.english: I'll prepare some common answers

subtitles.original: 僕ら巡りあうこと まさに一期一会
subtitles.english: Our meeting is truly a once-in-a-lifetime encounter

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも試練
subtitles.english: Both bitter and sweet are trials

subtitles.original: 連れ添ってこの手握って
subtitles.english: Staying together, holding this hand

subtitles.original: 生きづらい此処、浮き世から
subtitles.english: From this hard-to-live-in fleeting world

subtitles.original: 旗を掲げよ 宵闇が明く
subtitles.english: Raise the flag, the twilight brightens

subtitles.original: 酔いどれアガレヤ 憂えは忘るる
subtitles.english: Get drunk and rise up, forget your worries

subtitles.original: 昔も今も変わらず
subtitles.english: Unchanged past and present

subtitles.original: 浮世人の世は懐かしい
subtitles.english: This world of mortals is nostalgic

subtitles.original: いつだってちゃっちゃっちゃ おかし
subtitles.english: Always click-clack-click, strange

subtitles.original: 荒んで笑って合縁奇縁で それ それ それ それ
subtitles.english: Getting rough, laughing, bound by strange fate, sore, sore, sore, sore

subtitles.original: 深まる春も凍てつく雪の日も
subtitles.english: Deepening spring, freezing snowy days too

subtitles.original: 日出ずるすべての瞬きを君と見よう
subtitles.english: Let's watch every sunrise moment with you

subtitles.original: 彩る色 何処まででも
subtitles.english: Vibrant colors, to wherever they reach

subtitles.original: 空前絶後の見晴らしを眺めて
subtitles.english: Gazing at an unprecedented view

subtitles.original: 負けて花一匁
subtitles.english: Losing, Hana Ichi Monme

subtitles.original: 欲しがる欲しがる欲しがる声
subtitles.english: Voices wanting, wanting, wanting

subtitles.original: 勝てば恨んで買って選んで 呆気ないって泣いて
subtitles.english: Hating if you win, buying and choosing, crying that it's over too soon

subtitles.original: 猿真似の何番煎じじゃ 満ち足りないの
subtitles.english: Is it just a repetitive imitation? Not enough

subtitles.original: おいなっそ おいなっそ おいなっそ
subtitles.english: Oinaso, oinaso, oinaso

subtitles.original: 未だ進む道半ば哉
subtitles.english: The road still goes on

subtitles.original: おいなっそ おいなっそ おいなっそ
subtitles.english: Oinaso, oinaso, oinaso

subtitles.original: 如何なる時も一歩前へ出せ
subtitles.english: Always take a step forward

subtitles.original: 流行り廃りの浮き世なら
subtitles.english: In this fleeting world of trends

subtitles.original: 信ずる者はただ、君だけと
subtitles.english: The one I believe in is only you

subtitles.original: 踊れ騒げや 宵の歌えや
subtitles.english: Dance and make merry, sing in the evening

subtitles.original: 案ずることなどないの
subtitles.english: There's nothing to worry about

subtitles.original: 此の世人の世は恨めしい
subtitles.english: This world of mortals is resentful

subtitles.original: 雪駄はちゃっちゃっちゃ 愛し
subtitles.english: Snow sandals go click-clack-click, my love

subtitles.english: Clinging, bowing, battered all over, sore, sore, sore, sore

subtitles.original: 今を嘆いて昔を懐かしても
subtitles.english: Lamenting the present, longing for the past

subtitles.original: 君の心の内 流る深河
subtitles.english: Within your heart, a deep river flows

subtitles.original: それじゃ敵わん 何処にいても
subtitles.english: That won't do, no matter where you are

subtitles.original: めくるめく舞台は宵々、君を連れて
subtitles.english: Dazzling stage, every evening, taking you

subtitles.original: あまりてなどか人で恋しき
subtitles.english: Too much, why is a human so longing?

subtitles.original: 身勝手なのが世の理か
subtitles.english: Is being selfish the way of the world?

subtitles.original: 移ろうは古今 航路辿ら堂々
subtitles.english: Changing is ever-present, following the route proudly

subtitles.original: 恐るることなどはあつらえむ
subtitles.english: I'll prepare things for you to fear

subtitles.original: Hey、こんかなたー！
subtitles.english: Hey, kon-kanata!

subtitles.original: 2022年4月22日、天音かなたバースデーライブ
subtitles.english: April 22, 2022, Amane Kanata Birthday Live

subtitles.original: バーチャルアイドルが踊ってみた、始まりましたー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Virtual Idol Dance Cover has begun! Yay!

subtitles.original: で、今回「アニマル」「お願いマッスル」
subtitles.english: So, this time "Animal", "Onegai Muscle",

subtitles.original: そして「宵々古今」をお聞きいただきました。みんなどうだったー？
subtitles.english: and you just heard "Yoi Yoi Kokon". How was it, everyone?

subtitles.original: えー、ありがとう！コメント盛り上がってくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Eh, thank you! Thanks for the hype in the comments!

subtitles.original: 今回のライブのコンセプトはずばり「ダンス」「アイドル」「かなたそ」となっております。
subtitles.english: The concept of this live is "Dance", "Idol", and "Kanata-so".

subtitles.original: 12月の「リベンジ」というライブとはまた違ったかなたそをお送りするので、いっぱい、いっぱい、楽しんでいってね！
subtitles.english: I'll be showing a different side of myself compared to the "Revenge" live in December, so please enjoy it to the fullest!

subtitles.original: そしてみんな、今日の合言葉は…
subtitles.english: And everyone, today's catchphrase is...

subtitles.original: 「かなたんしか勝たん」！
subtitles.english: "Only Kanatan Wins"!

subtitles.original: いっぱい呟いてね！
subtitles.english: Please tweet it a lot!

subtitles.original: それでは早速次の曲…
subtitles.english: Now, without further ado, the next song...

subtitles.original: ちょっとクールなあの曲を、あの子と一緒に歌って踊ります。
subtitles.english: I'll sing and dance to that cool song with that girl.

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、ミュージック、スタート！
subtitles.english: Alright, music start!

subtitles.original: 'Oh my god'
subtitles.english: 'Oh my god'

subtitles.original: 愛のネタバレ「別れ」っぽいな
subtitles.english: The spoiler for love, seems like "parting"

subtitles.original: 人生のネタバレ「死ぬ」っぽいな
subtitles.english: The spoiler for life, seems like "dying"

subtitles.original: なにそれ意味深でかっこいいじゃん…
subtitles.english: What's that? It's so meaningful and cool...

subtitles.original: それっぽい単語集で踊ってんだ
subtitles.english: Dancing with a collection of words that seem like it

subtitles.original: 失敬
subtitles.english: Excuse me

subtitles.original: とう とぅるる とう とう とぅるる "風"
subtitles.english: Tou tururu tou tou tururu "Style"

subtitles.original: ぽいじゃん ぽいじゃん
subtitles.english: Seems like it, seems like it
